demo.description: The markets turned bullish and many people bought your stock
You decide you need to ramp up your advertising. But where will it be most successful?

responses.description: Launch an ad campaign in Asia.
Air a series of TV ads mocking the soviet union, in Russia, as a prank of course.

demo.description: A recent scandal has rocked your company. An offensive old tweet from your CFO went viral and made headlines everywhere. What do you do?

responses.description: Fire him and proclaim the tweet appalling.
Keep him around, but denounce the tweet and give the CFO a pay cut.
Do not even acknowledge the tweet and keep the CFO around. Maybe you'll even give him a bigger bonus this year.

demo.description: The company turned a massive profit last quarter, and you're sitting on a lot of cash. You decide to invest it. But how?

responses.description: Invest in treasury bonds. There's no need to take a big risk here.
Send it and invest all of it into an unheard of new startup
Buy a boat load of put options the S&P 500, banking on a crash. You've always been paranoid.
